Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
üêõ FIX: Add complete language mapping for word sets filter

Added missing language codes to langMap in /api/word-sets endpoint:
- ar \(arabic\)
- zh \(chinese\)
- ko \(korean\)
- pl \(polish\)
- ro \(romanian\)
- sr \(serbian\)
- tr \(turkish\)

This fixes the issue where word sets were not showing for users
with these language pairs \(e.g., test_de_es, test_ar_en, etc.\)

Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
üêõ FIX: Reset progress function calling non-existent methods

Fixed TypeError in resetAllWordsToStudying\(\) where it was calling:
- this.loadWords\(\) - method doesn''t exist
- this.renderWords\(\) - method doesn''t exist

Replaced with:
- this.updateWordLists\(\) - correct method to reload word lists
- Removed this.renderWords\(\) call as updateWordLists handles rendering

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
üî• FEATURE: Reset progress now DELETES all words instead of resetting status

Changed resetAllWordsToStudying\(\) behavior:
- Previously: Reset words to "studying" status \(kept words\)
- Now: DELETE all words and progress data \(complete reset\)

Frontend changes \(app.js\):
- Updated confirmation message to warn about deletion
- Changed API endpoint from /api/words/bulk/reset-to-studying \(PUT\) to /api/words/all \(DELETE\)
- Updated success/error messages to reflect deletion

Backend changes \(server-postgresql.js\):
- Enhanced /api/words/all endpoint to delete from BOTH tables:
  * words table \(old architecture\)
  * user_word_progress table \(new architecture\)
- Returns detailed count: wordsDeleted + progressDeleted

This gives users a true "fresh start" by removing all data for the selected language pair.

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
